Reviews.Title: HP Pavilion em1-2010nr
Reviews.Author: Benedict Ulcak "Ben Josef"
Reviews.Content: It does exactly what I bought it to do. What else can I say? It had to have a hdmi connection.

Reviews.Title: Very good item
Reviews.Author: Ainesis
Reviews.Content: This is a very good notebook, i purchase this one and I love my computer, is just for personal use and works great.

Reviews.Title: Computer match
Reviews.Author: Donna B. Welch "bj"
Reviews.Content: Couldn't have been a better match for my granddaughter.  Great for her advanced college courses in HS.  Easy to use.  Will probably add a wireless mouse.

Reviews.Title: Excellent!
Reviews.Author: M. R. "child development"
Reviews.Content: This product arrived on time and form, and It was on the stated condition. It works great and I can carry this just as a book!Thanks for being so professional.

Reviews.Title: No problems
Reviews.Author: waheed khan
Reviews.Content: I have been using it and it has not given me any kind of problem is the last 4 months

Reviews.Title: Hmmm.
Reviews.Author: Ceej's Views "Harley Gal"
Reviews.Content: Very poor service.  I bought two. neither one works completely. the touch pad is non functional -which is pretty much needed on a lap top....so have to use a mouse. Waited over a month before getting it. Very poor service. Too bad because it could have been a pretty cool little notebook.

ProductInfo.Features:
Windows 7 Premium 64-bit
11.6" diagonal High-Definition HP BrightView LED Display
2GB DDR3 System Memory (1 DIMM)
320GB (7200RPM) Hard Drive
1.3GHz VISION Technology from AMD with AMD Athlon II Neo Dual-Core Processor K325
ProductInfo.Name: HP Pavilion dm1-2010nr Notebook 11.6" Display
